title: Juvenile shows up at Tulsa hospital with gunshot wound
content:
An unknown-aged juvenile showed up at Hillcrest Hospital with a gunshot wound to his leg.
The shooting reportedly happened around 1:48 a.m. Sunday morning.
Police say the victim isn't cooperating with officers.
He did state the shooting happened near a park. However, there were no reports of any shots fired calls around that area.
His injuries are said to be non-life threatening.
Police don't have a description of a suspect.
We will update the story if and when more information becomes available.
